function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Compromised destination image and tourism market due to inappropriate media coverage of the virus's origins.","Impact":"Decreased outbound and inbound tourism, fear of discrimination and violence, reduced visits to affected areas.","Mitigation":"Responsible and accurate media coverage, education on the virus's origins and risks.","Technologies":"Travel advisory apps, social media monitoring tools for tourism authorities.","People":"Outbound and inbound tourists, media professionals, tourism industry stakeholders.","Owner":"Media organizations, tourism authorities, government agencies."},{"Description":"Time-related costs and frustrations due to quarantine-related measures during the epidemic.","Impact":"Disruption of travel schedules and services, influence on travelers' post-experience behavior.","Mitigation":"Efficient quarantine protocols, clear communication of travel policies, flexibility in travel arrangements.","Technologies":"Digital health passports, real-time travel updates via mobile apps, communication platforms for travelers.","People":"Travelers, service providers, travel agencies.","Owner":"Health authorities, travel industry, technology providers."},{"Description":"Influence of psychological distance on tourists' risk perceptions and behavioral changes.","Impact":"Changes in consumer behavior, decision-making influenced by risk perceptions.","Mitigation":"Psychological distance reduction strategies, risk communication and education for tourists.","Technologies":"Virtual tourism experiences, online learning platforms for travel risk management.","People":"Consumers, tourists, travel service providers.","Owner":"Tourism industry, education institutions, travel technology providers."}]}
